game.name: Motivi Galaxy
game.shortDescription: Motivi Galaxy is a creature collecting gamified task tracker with helpful productivity tools. Work toward long term goals with small steps each day, unlock upgrades, and get motivated by your bottom-of-the-screen alien friends who transform to reflect your real life growth.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Motivi Galaxy is a creature collecting gamified task tracker with helpful productivity tools. Work toward long term goals with small steps each day, unlock upgrades, and get motivated by your bottom-of-the-screen alien friends who transform to reflect your real life growth.
